subject: RE: [junit] JUnit remote execution and TD
msgSnippet: Enhanced JUnit uses remote test execution agents to run JUnit tests remotely. That is, it uses remote test execution agents to distribute JUnit tests to other
messageBody:
Enhanced JUnit uses remote test execution agents to run JUnit tests
remotely. That is, it uses remote test execution agents to distribute
JUnit tests to other machines and get back results.

The URL is: http://www.javatesting.com/Product/enhancedjunit/

Please feel free to contact me directly with technical questions, as
I've had TD integration on my list of to-dos for a long time and would
be happy to help.

- Mike

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Mike Silverstein          
SilverMark, Inc.
The Object Testing Company
www.javatesting.com

>

> Hello there,
>
> I am going to use Test Director's facilities for a remote
>
> JUnit tests execution.
>
> For this I have to create different things:
>
> - a Remote Agent class
>
> - a test type plug-in for JUnit
>
> ...
>
> Even if it is well documented, it would be a nice Xmas present
>
> for me to have a sample of such an integration. Has someone
>
> already done that???
>
> Many thanks in advance,
>
>
>
> Eric RIOU
